fractions.subject: Maths
fractions.title: Maths – Fractions (Generated)
fractions.summary: Explore how fractions work and how to compare them.
fractions.content: Fractions represent parts of a whole. Learn to simplify, compare, and convert them.

synonyms.title: English – Synonyms (Generated)
synonyms.summary: Understand how to spot and use synonyms in context.
synonyms.content: Synonyms are words with similar meanings. Practice matching and replacing them in sentences.
